attributes.action: funding into the reaserch and provide new effective treatment for neuroblastoma
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: my name is elaine lindup. in november 2008 my 3 year old daughter ruby was diagnoised with a rare aggressive cancer called neuroblastoma. ruby underwent many operations and varius tests before sadly 3 weeks later my beautiful ruby passed away. one of rubys tumers was donated for more reasearch into this cancer. these past 12 months have been a very difficult time for me and my family. but i will continue to fight in rubys name to get the treatment other countries have, in england to potentally save other children who have this terrible disease.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to funding into the reaserch and provide new effective treatment for neuroblastoma.

Her Majesty's Government has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.hmg.gov.uk/epetition-responses/petition-view.aspx?epref=rubys-right
